extendedInfo.description: Devil Hunter, the amazing physical and puzzle game!The devils came in, occupied the village and drove all the villagers out of the country. It's time that all of the survived villagers take weapons to fight with the devils. Please help to Kill all of the devils and get their home back.=======================================================================How to play:1. Click the fragile stone to drop it on the devils.2. Slice or click to cut chains to put down heavy stones.3. Click the pop to blast it.4. Try to ignite the bombs to kill the devils.And more interesting weapons are waiting for you to find!==========================Ezjoy is the name behind Marble Blast, Jewels Maze, Empire VS Orcs, Bird Blast, Bubble Pop, Devil Hunter, Ice Breaker, Jewels Miner and many other top popular games.==========================

reviews.title: Awesome game. It\'s a brain teaser 4 sure!
reviews.comment: Really good game but level 30 has me completely stumped?! A tip would b nice 2 move 2 the nx brain teaser!
reviews.author: T. Ramos

reviews.title: gruesome and fun
reviews.comment: I like this game even though my screen is small. the graphics are really cool although sometimes I can\'t figure out the levels maybe my screen is too small. Its very addictive too. I tried level 28 for at least 60 times in a row!
reviews.author: Susie Marie

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very entertaining, fun and makes you think. Great/cute graphics. Had No problems with it.
reviews.author: Stacy Pavnica

reviews.title: Denwer31
reviews.comment: Good game good fun cool I love this kind of games Thank you guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very fun and challenging with a gross but cute edge.
reviews.comment: Very fun with a gross and cute edge. Love it!;-)
reviews.author: Sydney Adams

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: So far so good.... running smoothly and entertaining as well... recommended for sure!
reviews.author: Sharon Lawson

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: For a free game, it is waaaayyyy to awesome than some of paid games. Totally cool to release your stress. Lol...it make u think, but in the same way it is funny because all of the monsters are cute!
reviews.author: Emira Jimin

reviews.title: Devil Hunter
reviews.comment: Not exactly \"amazing\" but an interesting twist on physics puzzles. I only played a dozen or so levels but so far success lies in mental ability far more than lightening fast reflexes, which suits this more \"mature\" player just fine.
reviews.author: Patricia Getchell

reviews.title: Superrrt game... A must dwnload
reviews.comment: Cool graphics wid intrstng levels... A must download for ppl who lyk challenging games... Gud work.. Keep it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dragonlady of indiana
reviews.comment: It looks like it wood be fun if directions were where u could see and read them. I\'m  playing it on a pantech element its like the I pad but its only 8in but gets internet  pretty much anywhere your at   I take it everywhere.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool Challenge...I like it!
reviews.comment: Good and fun game.  Great price (free) too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!  :-D
reviews.comment: Lol..this game is hilarious! I dnt normally rate games & the 1s I have rated is because they tell u 2 give there app 5 star\'s 2 get a bonus. But this game has earned it with great graphics & game play... Well done 2 the Developers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Funny
reviews.comment: My 4yr old loves to play. He thinks the lil devils r funny and when they makes there sounds he L.H.A.O. This game makes him think and he has to time it just right.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Typical
reviews.comment: This game was fun until I got to a level I cannot pass because there is an advertisement banner covering the block I need to get rid of. Adverts are okay but please let us temporarily disable them..I\'m uninstalling for this..no reason to keep it if I can\'t finish it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GOOD GAME
reviews.comment: This is a pretty challenging game, but entertaining. It gets old fast.
reviews.author: Zachary Garcia

reviews.title: Sambo
reviews.comment: How do ya get passed the level where u just have red blocks there\'s no way to get him to fall and touch the bomb unless I\'m stupid and don\'t see somethin its makin me mad but I\'m not gonna throw my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brains required..
reviews.comment: You would surely need some brains to complete the game....basic graphics ...good gameplay and awesome music....
reviews.author: Yash Nanda

reviews.title: Awesome puzzle game
reviews.comment: Although I beat it in just a few hours. Was very good flawless gameplay. Wish other devs would put half the effort you guys did on their apps and games. Need more please!!!
reviews.author: Anonymous Legion

reviews.title: Super fun game!
reviews.comment: I lovePhysics based games cut the rope angry birds etc this game is quickly becoming a fav if u like the b4 mentioned type of games you\'ll love this

reviews.comment: I love devil hunter im playing it for the secound time in row please update it we need a secound devil hunter you get done with it fast all be waiting!!!
